scripts.build: npm run build -w @tinfoilsh/verifier && npm run build -w tinfoil
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:integration && npm run test:browser && npm run test:browser:integration
scripts.publish:verifier: npm run build -w @tinfoilsh/verifier && npm publish -w @tinfoilsh/verifier --access public
scripts.publish:tinfoil: npm run build -w tinfoil && npm publish -w tinfoil --access public
